what_you_do: I help mission driven entrepreneurs to make their Soul Connections so that they can impact and change the world, scale their businesses to six and seven figures, and enjoy thrilling Soul Success in every arena of their lives.
who_you_serve: transformational leaders – authors, speakers, coaches and healers
seeking: I guide transformational leaders to thrive in their Divine purpose of transforming lives. Whether clients engage in private consulting or contribute to the Soul Affiliate Alliance as members or collaborators, they grow their audience, enroll new clients, and scale their businesses to make a greater impact in the world while creating more freedom, abundance and joy in their own lives.
social_proof: I am the #1 best-selling author of Soulful Leadership: A Spiritual Path to Health, Wealth and Love
signature_programs: The D.I.S.C.E.R.N.™ Process, Soulful Leadership Retreat
business_focus: Helping mission-driven entrepreneurs connect with their inner being, divine purpose, and divine tribe to scale their businesses and make a greater impact.
service_provided: private consulting, Soul Affiliate Alliance membership, Soulful Leadership Retreat
